articles.author: Richard Connor, Karl Sexton, Rana Taha
articles.title: Trump says '100%' confident of US trade deal with EU - DW
articles.description: Ahead of talks with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, the US president told reporters "of course there will be a trade deal" with Europe, which he has threatened with tariffs. More on DW.
articles.content:
A Democratic US senator visiting El Salvador was denied access to the man wrongly deported by the US and then held in a notorious prison.
Maryland's Senator Chris Van Hollen said on Wednesday that a… [+2082 chars]
